logo.name: Drag and drop into a running Eclipse workspace to install OfficeFloor (typically to a free space in the tool bar at the top)
logo.title: Drag and drop into a running Eclipse workspace to install OfficeFloor (typically to a free space in the tool bar at the top)

logo.name: Drag and drop the Install Icon into a running Eclipse workspace to install OfficeFloor (typically to a free space in the tool bar at the top)
logo.title: Drag and drop the Install Icon into a running Eclipse workspace to install OfficeFloor (typically to a free space in the tool bar at the top)

body.head:
<!-- shortcut icon -->
			<link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" />
			<!-- Google Analytics -->
			<script type="text/javascript">
				var _gaq = _gaq || [];
				_gaq.push(['_setAccount',
				'UA-23477455-1']);
				_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

				(function() {
				var ga
				= document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript';
				ga.async = true;
				ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ?
				'https://ssl' :
				'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
				var s =
				document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
				})();
			</script>
			<!-- Woopra -->
			<script>
				var woo_settings = {idle_timeout:'300000',
				domain:'officefloor.net'};
				(function(){
				var wsc =
				document.createElement('script');
				wsc.src =
				document.location.protocol+'//static.woopra.com/js/woopra.js';
				wsc.type = 'text/javascript';
				wsc.async = true;
				var ssc =
				document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				ssc.parentNode.insertBefore(wsc, ssc);
				})();
			</script>
			<!-- Facebook administration -->
			<meta property="fb:admins" content="sagenschneider" />
			<meta property="fb:app_id" content="336336786442645" />
